subject: Football
lead_paragraph: After six mostly disappointing N.F.L. seasons, quarterback Alex Smith has found a comrade in arms in Coach Jim Harbaugh, and has helped San Francisco to a 6-1 start.
snippet: After six mostly disappointing N.F.L. seasons, quarterback Alex Smith has found a comrade in arms in Coach Jim Harbaugh, and has helped San Francisco to a 6-1 start.
